function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases through respiratory aerosols and surfactants","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of viruses","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation, use of face masks, and regular disinfection","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, disinfection equipment","People":"General population, healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of temperature and humidity on virus survival","Impact":"Increased virus persistence and survival in the environment","Mitigation":"Controlling indoor temperature and humidity, implementing air circulation, and regular cleaning","Technologies":"Thermostats, dehumidifiers, humidifiers, air circulation systems","People":"General population, building occupants, public health authorities","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Thermal degradation of influenza virus in various systems (aerosols, droplets, surfaces, etc.)","Impact":"Potential for virus survival and transmission in different environmental settings","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, implementing proper waste management, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, waste management systems, personal protective equipment","People":"General population, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building managers, healthcare facilities, cleaning companies"}]}
